mapper.select: select DISTINCT s.sNUM sNum, s.sTITLE sTitle, s.sPEOPLENUM sPeoplenum, s.sPW sPw, s.sDATE sDate, s.sCATEGORY sCategory, s.mID mId, s.sCOMMENT sComment from STUDYROOM s left join FAVORITES f on s.sNum = f.sNum where f.mId =#{mId} union select DISTINCT s.sNUM sNum, s.sTITLE sTitle, s.sPEOPLENUM sPeoplenum, s.sPW sPw, s.sDATE sDate, s.sCATEGORY sCategory, s.mID mId, s.sCOMMENT sComment from STUDYROOM s right join FAVORITES f on s.sNum = f.sNum where f.mId =#{mId}

select DISTINCT s.sNUM sNum, s.sTITLE sTitle, s.sPEOPLENUM sPeoplenum, s.sPW sPw, s.sDATE sDate, r.sDATE rDATE, s.sCATEGORY sCategory, s.mID mId, s.sCOMMENT sComment from STUDYROOM s left join (select DISTINCT r.* from ROOMROG r where mid =#{mId} order by r.sDATE desc) as r on s.sNUM =r.sNUM WHERE r.mid = #{mId} WHERE r.mID =#{mId} and r.sDate BETWEEN DATE_ADD(NOW(),INTERVAL -1 DAY ) AND NOW() WHERE r.mID =#{mId} and r.sDate BETWEEN DATE_ADD(NOW(),INTERVAL -7 DAY ) AND NOW() WHERE r.mID =#{mId} and r.sDate BETWEEN DATE_ADD(NOW(),INTERVAL -30 DAY ) AND NOW() WHERE r.mid = #{mId} ORDER by rDate desc
mapper.delete: DELETE from FAVORITES where mID =#{mId} and sNUM =#{sNum}
mapper.select: select count(*) sFavorNum from FAVORITES f group by sNum having sNum = #{sNum} order by sNum asc
select sNum from FAVORITES where mID =#{mId} and sNUM =#{sNum}
